amendment.description: Amendment to the Sanders amendment (A009) clarified that funding for intelligence activities would be frozen at the FY 1998 level rather then the FY 1999 level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Sanders amendment to limit total funding to the amount authorized for Fiscal Year 1998 instead of Fiscal Year 1999.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Dixon to the Sanders amendment (A007).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dixon amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
